entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. This VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's completely useless. Doesn't track my sleep properly, and the heart rate is all over the place!
I understand your frustration, sir. I'm sorry you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. Can you please provide your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's [customer's email address]. Just hurry this up, please. I don't have all day.
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. Can you tell me why you wish to return it?
I just told you! It doesn't work! The heart rate monitoring is garbage, and it doesn't track my sleep accurately. It's a waste of money.

I understand. We want you to be completely satisfied with your VeloFit purchase. Our standard return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase. Let me quickly check the date, and we can proceed with the return process.

Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [Date 15 days prior to current date]. That falls well within our return policy. So, no problem to return. Can you confirm your shipping address so I can start the return label?
Finally! Took you long enough. [Customer gives address]. Just email me the label, okay?

Certainly. I've emailed you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the item, we'll process your refund. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days. We do require all components, including the charger, be returned for a full refund.
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today regarding your VeloFit purchase or smart watch accessories?
No, that's it. Thanks for the help.
Thank you for contacting VeloFit. Have a great day!
